text: Pa ri sibꞌalaj tyoxalaj kꞌolibꞌal kꞌut xwi kokik ri kinimal ri chꞌawenelabꞌ, we riꞌ xaq junmul pa jun junabꞌ kakꞌulmatajik. Ri chꞌawenel are kok bꞌik pa ri sibꞌalaj tyoxalaj kꞌolibꞌal kukꞌam bꞌik kikꞌ rech kuta kuybꞌal umak areꞌ xuqujeꞌ kuꞌta kuybꞌal kimak ri winaq ri kemakunik man rukꞌ ta kichomabꞌal.
